Battle Cards

Bumpers

  1. What happens if a card tries to move damage counters to the upgraded character?
    That effect is ignored. The damage counters stay where they are. They aren’t repaired. If the card trying to move the damage counters has other instructions, those are still followed if possible.
  2. If I have a character with Bumpers attached, and I play Involuntary Promotion on a car in my KO area, does the returned character receive the Bumpers in time to prevent the damage counters from being moved?
    The damage and upgrades are moved at the same time. Bumpers’ effect won’t stop the damage counters from being moved.
